languages.text: {n}Дюжина настороженных взглядов упирается в вас. Перед вами — типичные обитатели нижних палуб. Простая одежда, грубоватое снаряжение, лица, среди которых попадаются слегка странные, то ли просто уродливые, то ли с признаками легких мутаций.{/n}

{n}A dozen pairs of eyes stare apprehensively at you. The people before you are typical inhabitants of the lower decks — you take in their simple clothing, crude weapons, and faces that display varying levels of mutation, from the barely discernible, to the strange, to the outright grotesque.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Дюжина настороженных взглядов упирается в вас. Перед вами — типичные обитатели нижних палуб. Простая одежда, грубоватое снаряжение, лица, среди которых попадаются слегка странные, то ли просто уродливые, то ли с признаками легких мутаций.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A dozen pairs of eyes stare apprehensively at you. The people gathered behind the flimsy barricade are typical inhabitants of the lower decks — you take in their simple clothing, crude weapons, and faces that display varying levels of mutation, from the strange, to the outright grotesque, to the barely discernible.{/n}

{n}A dozen pairs of eyes stare apprehensively at you. The people gathered behind the flimsy barricade are typical inhabitants of the lower decks — you take in their simple clothing, crude weapons, and faces that display varying levels of mutation, from the strange, to the outright grotesque, to the barely discernible.{/n}

{n}A dozen pairs of eyes stare apprehensively at you. The people gathered behind the flimsy barricade are typical inhabitants of the lower decks — you take in their simple clothing, crude weapons, and faces that display varying levels of mutation, from the strange, to the outright grotesque, to the barely discernible.{/n}

{n}A dozen pairs of eyes stare apprehensively at you. The people before you are typical inhabitants of the lower decks — you take in their simple clothing, crude weapons, and faces that display varying levels of mutation, from the barely discernible, to the strange, to the outright grotesque.{/n}

{n}A dozen pairs of eyes stare apprehensively at you. The people before you are typical inhabitants of the lower decks — you take in their simple clothing, crude weapons, and faces that display varying levels of mutation, from the barely discernible, to the strange, to the outright grotesque.{/n}

languages.text: {n}十几双眼睛忐忑不安地注视着你。你面前的这些人是底层甲板的典型船员。他们穿着简陋的衣服，手里握着粗糙的武器，脸上也带着各种程度的变异。有的人的五官还能分辨出来，有的人长得奇形怪状，还有的人完全不成人样。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A dozen pairs of eyes stare apprehensively at you. The people before you are typical inhabitants of the lower decks — you take in their simple clothing, crude weapons, and faces that display varying levels of mutation, from the barely discernible, to the strange, to the outright grotesque.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}十几双眼睛忐忑不安地注视着你。你面前的这些人是底层甲板的典型船员。他们穿着简陋的衣服，手里握着粗糙的武器，脸上也带着各种程度的变异。有的人的五官还能分辨出来，有的人长得奇形怪状，还有的人完全不成人样。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Las miradas aprensivas de los habitantes de las cubiertas inferiores recaen sobre ti: gente de ropa sencilla, armas rudimentarias y caras que muestran distintos niveles de mutación, desde las casi imperceptibles a las extrañas y las verdaderamente grotescas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A dozen pairs of eyes stare apprehensively at you. The people before you are typical inhabitants of the lower decks — you take in their simple clothing, crude weapons, and faces that display varying levels of mutation, from the barely discernible, to the strange, to the outright grotesque.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Las miradas aprensivas de los habitantes de las cubiertas inferiores recaen sobre ti: gente de ropa sencilla, armas rudimentarias y caras que muestran distintos niveles de mutación, desde las casi imperceptibles a las extrañas y las verdaderamente grotescas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}十数組の目が不安げにあなたを見つめている。目の前にいるのは、下層デッキの典型的な住人たちだ。彼らの簡素な服装、粗末な武器、そして、かろうじて見分けがつくものから奇妙なもの、まったくグロテスクなものまで、さまざまなレベルの変異を示す顔が、あなたの前に並んでいる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A dozen pairs of eyes stare apprehensively at you. The people before you are typical inhabitants of the lower decks — you take in their simple clothing, crude weapons, and faces that display varying levels of mutation, from the barely discernible, to the strange, to the outright grotesque.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}十数組の目が不安げにあなたを見つめている。目の前にいるのは、下層デッキの典型的な住人たちだ。彼らの簡素な服装、粗末な武器、そして、かろうじて見分けがつくものから奇妙なもの、まったくグロテスクなものまで、さまざまなレベルの変異を示す顔が、あなたの前に並んでいる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ein dutzend Augenpaare starren dich nervös an. Die Leute vor dir sind typische Bewohner der Unterdecks — zu erkennen an der simplen Kleidung, den kruden Waffen und den Gesichtern mit unterschiedlich starken Mutationen, von kaum wahrnehmbaren über sonderbares bis hin zu nachgerade grotesken.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A dozen pairs of eyes stare apprehensively at you. The people before you are typical inhabitants of the lower decks — you take in their simple clothing, crude weapons, and faces that display varying levels of mutation, from the barely discernible, to the strange, to the outright grotesque.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein dutzend Augenpaare starren dich nervös an. Die Leute vor dir sind typische Bewohner der Unterdecks — zu erkennen an der simplen Kleidung, den kruden Waffen und den Gesichtern mit unterschiedlich starken Mutationen, von kaum wahrnehmbaren über sonderbares bis hin zu nachgerade grotesken.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Une dizaine de paires d'yeux vous fixent d'un regard empreint d'appréhension. Avec leurs vêtements simples, leurs armes de fortune et leurs visages affichant divers stades de mutation, des altérations à peine visibles aux malformations les plus grotesques, ces gens correspondent tout à fait à l'archétype des résidents des ponts inférieurs.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A dozen pairs of eyes stare apprehensively at you. The people before you are typical inhabitants of the lower decks — you take in their simple clothing, crude weapons, and faces that display varying levels of mutation, from the barely discernible, to the strange, to the outright grotesque.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Une dizaine de paires d'yeux vous fixent d'un regard empreint d'appréhension. Avec leurs vêtements simples, leurs armes de fortune et leurs visages affichant divers stades de mutation, des altérations à peine visibles aux malformations les plus grotesques, ces gens correspondent tout à fait à l'archétype des résidents des ponts inférieurs.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yirmi kadar göz, bakışlarını sana kenetliyor. Karşındaki insanlar, alt güvertenin sıradan sakinleri. Basit kıyafetleri, derme çatma silahları ve farklı seviyelerde mutasyona uğramış suratları gözüne çarpıyor. Kimi neredeyse tanınmaz hâle gelmiş, kimi tuhaf, kimiyse apaçık iğrenç.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A dozen pairs of eyes stare apprehensively at you. The people before you are typical inhabitants of the lower decks — you take in their simple clothing, crude weapons, and faces that display varying levels of mutation, from the barely discernible, to the strange, to the outright grotesque.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}İki düzine göz, bakışlarını sana kenetliyor. Karşındaki insanlar, alt güvertenin sıradan sakinleri. Basit kıyafetleri, derme çatma silahları ve farklı seviyelerde mutasyona uğramış suratları gözüne çarpıyor. Kimi neredeyse tanınmaz hâle gelmiş, kimi tuhaf, kimiyse apaçık iğrenç.{/n}
